org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Interface SafeMode

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Namesystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FSNamesystem

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface SafeMode
    SafeMode related operations.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkSafeMode()
      Check safe mode conditions.
      void decrementSafeBlockCount(Block b)
      Decrement number of blocks that reached minimal replication.

      Increment number of blocks that reached minimal replication.

      Is the system in startup safe mode, i.e.
      boolean isPopulatingReplQueues()
      Check whether replication queues are being populated.

    • Method Detail

      • checkSafeMode

        void checkSafeMode()
        Check safe mode conditions. If the corresponding conditions are satisfied, trigger the system to enter/leave safe mode.

      • isInSafeMode

        boolean isInSafeMode()
        Is the system in safe mode?

      • isInStartupSafeMode

        boolean isInStartupSafeMode()
        Is the system in startup safe mode, i.e. the system is starting up with safe mode turned on automatically?

      • isPopulatingReplQueues

        boolean isPopulatingReplQueues()
        Check whether replication queues are being populated.

      • incrementSafeBlockCount

        void incrementSafeBlockCount(int replication)
        Increment number of blocks that reached minimal replication.
        Parameters:
        replication - current replication

      • decrementSafeBlockCount

        void decrementSafeBlockCount(Block b)
        Decrement number of blocks that reached minimal replication.
